Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the plant LTP family
Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Plant non-specific lipid-transfer proteins transfer phospholipids as well as galactolipids across membranes. May play a role in wax or cutin deposition in the cell walls of expanding epidermal cells and certain secretory tissues (By similarity).

Literature.Title: Isolation and characterization of lipid transfer protein in wheat.
Literature.Author: Seo Y.W, Jang C.S, Bu S.Y, Kim J.B.

Literature.Title: The Triticum aestivum non-specific lipid transfer protein (TaLtp) gene family: comparative promoter activity of six TaLtp genes in transgenic rice.
Literature.Author: Gautier M.-F.,Joudrier P.,Guiderdoni E.,Meynard D.,Boutrot F.
